title: BADecker
author: BADecker
content: What is the truth? There is solid evidence both ways... that Hitler died in Germany, and that Hitler went to Argentina.Were dental records faked and lied about, the ones that show that the corpse in Germany was really Hitler?The many documents in Argentina make that story seem real. But, could they have been faked with a Hitler lookalike?Adolf Hitler old man pic and passport. He came to Argentina and got hidden in Patagoniahttps://helenastales.weebly.com/blogue/adolf-hitler-old-man-pic-and-passport-he-came-to-argentina-and-got-hidden-in-patagoniaCarlos Perciavalle a chilling story: the day he saw Adolf Hitler in Bariloche.??The king of the café-concert turns 82 with the certainty of having seen the German leader and his lover Eva Braun. He was with his great friend China Zorrilla.And he recounted the event this way with his great friend: "We were having tea with China Zorrilla in the restaurant of a very nice hotel in Bariloche and the waiter told us that since we were very important artists who came from Buenos Aires, the owner of the place wanted to meet us. He told us that he lived next door and out of pure rabble we went to meet him.". . . . . . . . . . .There are hundreds of FBI documents regarding Hitler, including reports of alleged witnesses to Hitler survival in Argentina.Some pages are heavily redacted, others are not.https://vault.fbi.gov/adolf-hitler/adolf-hitler-part-01-of-04/view...

comments.author: Kavelj22
comments.body: There is also solid evidence that he committed suicide in an attempt to explain his disappearance. Other evidence also can be considered solid, indicating that he was liquidated with his beloved Eva Brown, and that no one knows the fate of the children.This narration, for example, states that it was confirmed that Hitler died in 1945 through one of his teeth, which was treated medically: https://www.history.com/news/hitler-death-cause-teeth-analysisThere will remain multiple accounts of Hitler's fate and all of them will try to draw the threads of the conspiracy, but what is certain is that there are actually those who know the truth and perhaps it is still too early for his facts to appear to the public.

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: Quote from: montaga on May 26, 2023, 05:16:26 AMYou be the judgehttps://ibb.co/6tbgvcvhttps://www.amazon.com/Irresponsible-Self-Laughter-Novel/dp/0312424604Wow! Looks like transgendering, and anti-aging for them, started ages ago.

comments.author: montaga
comments.body: He not the only "death man walking" over the years

comments.author: aoluain
comments.body: Argentina was a popular destination for Nazi's to escape to after the fall of the Third Reichand Mossad agents were successful in identifying them and bringing them to justice butfor sure if Hitler had gone to Argentina Mossad would have found him.Surely some of the high ranking Nazi's who were apprehended in Argentina would haveknown if Hitler was there and would have definitely told about his whereabouts in order to try and save themselves?These stories although very interesting are just conspiracy theories.https://www.history.com/news/the-7-most-notorious-nazis-who-escaped-to-south-america

comments.author: collinscoinz
comments.body: Argentina was a popular destination for Nazi's to escape to after the fall of the Third Reichand Mossad agents were successful in identifying them and bringing them to justice butfor sure if Hitler had gone to Argentina Mossad would have found him.Surely some of the high ranking Nazi's who were apprehended in Argentina would haveknown if Hitler was there and would have definitely told about his whereabouts in order to try and save themselves?These stories although very interesting are just conspiracy.and again there is also solid proof that he committed suicide in an attempt to explained his sudden disappearance.

comments.author: montaga
comments.body: His Grandfather in the Ashkenazi  Jewish Cemetery Philanthropy in Bucharest, Romania. https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/66524140/adolf-hittlerhttps://web.archive.org/web/20230307090159/https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/66524140/adolf-hittler

comments.author: swogerino
comments.body: Quote from: Kavelj22 on May 25, 2023, 11:30:31 PMThere is also solid evidence that he committed suicide in an attempt to explain his disappearance. Other evidence also can be considered solid, indicating that he was liquidated with his beloved Eva Brown, and that no one knows the fate of the children.This narration, for example, states that it was confirmed that Hitler died in 1945 through one of his teeth, which was treated medically: https://www.history.com/news/hitler-death-cause-teeth-analysisThere will remain multiple accounts of Hitler's fate and all of them will try to draw the threads of the conspiracy, but what is certain is that there are actually those who know the truth and perhaps it is still too early for his facts to appear to the public.I don't think it is to early as if there are some solid evidence of him having lived a life in Argentina as stated above would have been found by the secret services of Israel without problems,with all the evolving technologies and the Internet it would have been a piece of cake for them to find him.The fact that they have not found anything related to him in Argentina means that most likely this is a conspiracy theory and some other conspiracy theory says he went and lived in Brazil until he died 95 years of age,something without any proof or evidence at all,this means that for me the most trustworthy version is that he committed suicide in order to not shame himself by falling in what he used to call "enemy" hands.

comments.author: Bananington
comments.body: Quote from: swogerino on June 25, 2023, 05:51:57 PMI don't think it is to early as if there are some solid evidence of him having lived a life in Argentina as stated above would have been found by the secret services of Israel without problems,with all the evolving technologies and the Internet it would have been a piece of cake for them to find him.The fact that they have not found anything related to him in Argentina means that most likely this is a conspiracy theory and some other conspiracy theory says he went and lived in Brazil until he died 95 years of age,something without any proof or evidence at all,this means that for me the most trustworthy version is that he committed suicide in order to not shame himself by falling in what he used to call "enemy" hands.That's how we heard that Tupac Amaru Shakur was living a life somewhere. It is hard to believe many things these days, but something I know is that there is usually some truth to any rumour. It is not impossible that he faked his suicide and death maybe as a way out of all the crisis that he caused knowing that there was no other way for him to live a free life afterwards.

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: I wonder where Putin really is right now.Putin's plane reportedly departs from Moscow to Valdai, disappears from radars – mediahttps://www.msn.com/en-us/news/world/putin-s-plane-reportedly-departs-from-moscow-to-valdai-disappears-from-radars-media/ar-AA1cYzWN?ocid=msedgntp&cvid=9998cd1a5b0c46c7a52b293efb754392&ei=14However, Hajun said it was not known who was on board the plane, although it was an aircraft which has been used by the Russian dictator several times.The plane reportedly disappeared from radars near the Russian city of Tver (about 150 kilometers from Valdai), the independent Russian website Important Stories (IStories) said on Telegram on June 24. The media outlet claims that the plane is "equipped to control the armed forces."While commenting on Putin's whereabouts to the state-controlled TASS news agency, his press secretary Dmitry Peskov said his boss "is working in the Kremlin."The Ukrainian online publication Ukrainska Pravda cites an unnamed source in the Ukrainian special services who states that "Putin is leaving Moscow, he is being taken to Valdai."...

comments.author: Hispo
comments.body: Quote from: BADecker on June 25, 2023, 09:52:33 PMI wonder where Putin really is right now.Putin's plane reportedly departs from Moscow to Valdai, disappears from radars – mediahttps://www.msn.com/en-us/news/world/putin-s-plane-reportedly-departs-from-moscow-to-valdai-disappears-from-radars-media/ar-AA1cYzWN?ocid=msedgntp&cvid=9998cd1a5b0c46c7a52b293efb754392&ei=14However, Hajun said it was not known who was on board the plane, although it was an aircraft which has been used by the Russian dictator several times.The plane reportedly disappeared from radars near the Russian city of Tver (about 150 kilometers from Valdai), the independent Russian website Important Stories (IStories) said on Telegram on June 24. The media outlet claims that the plane is "equipped to control the armed forces."While commenting on Putin's whereabouts to the state-controlled TASS news agency, his press secretary Dmitry Peskov said his boss "is working in the Kremlin."The Ukrainian online publication Ukrainska Pravda cites an unnamed source in the Ukrainian special services who states that "Putin is leaving Moscow, he is being taken to Valdai."...It is better for him if people do not really know about his location anyways, considering what has transpired with the boss of his mercenary group.My guess is that he is still in the Kremlin, I would assume he is very secure there, the whole mobilization and plane story could be some sort of bait to confuse his enemies, he may be a little bit paranoid on a possible assassination attempt getting cooked eventually. Unlikely, but possible in these weird times we are witnessing.

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: Quote from: Hispo on June 25, 2023, 11:36:08 PMQuote from: BADecker on June 25, 2023, 09:52:33 PMI wonder where Putin really is right now.Putin's plane reportedly departs from Moscow to Valdai, disappears from radars – mediahttps://www.msn.com/en-us/news/world/putin-s-plane-reportedly-departs-from-moscow-to-valdai-disappears-from-radars-media/ar-AA1cYzWN?ocid=msedgntp&cvid=9998cd1a5b0c46c7a52b293efb754392&ei=14However, Hajun said it was not known who was on board the plane, although it was an aircraft which has been used by the Russian dictator several times.The plane reportedly disappeared from radars near the Russian city of Tver (about 150 kilometers from Valdai), the independent Russian website Important Stories (IStories) said on Telegram on June 24. The media outlet claims that the plane is "equipped to control the armed forces."While commenting on Putin's whereabouts to the state-controlled TASS news agency, his press secretary Dmitry Peskov said his boss "is working in the Kremlin."The Ukrainian online publication Ukrainska Pravda cites an unnamed source in the Ukrainian special services who states that "Putin is leaving Moscow, he is being taken to Valdai."...It is better for him if people do not really know about his location anyways, considering what has transpired with the boss of his mercenary group.My guess is that he is still in the Kremlin, I would assume he is very secure there, the whole mobilization and plane story could be some sort of bait to confuse his enemies, he may be a little bit paranoid on a possible assassination attempt getting cooked eventually. Unlikely, but possible in these weird times we are witnessing. Who can we really trust? Who can Putin trust? Who did Hitler trust? There are some not-popular histories that say that Hitler didn't know about a lot of things going on in his Germany. Some say that he didn't even realize that a holocaust was going on, and that the concentration camps were really death camps. His generals hid much of the truth from him... maybe to use him for some kind of scapegoat if they failed in WW2.Consider Julian Assange and Wikileaks. The reason 'they' are persecuting him so badly, is not because of the info that he made known to the public. Rather, it's because of his theme in doing it. His theme was to get the elite to not trust each other, and thereby weaken their strategies, and maybe even bring down their empire.Is that what is happening to Putin? Does he wonder if he can trust, for example, Medvedev? Elon Musk sent him a message telling him not to trust anybody. Did that message weaken his good trust in his loyal people around him, somewhat?
